typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		source_code_key as string,
		source_system as string,
		target_code as string,
		target_description as string,
		code_type_id as double,
		code2 as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		code_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
TCrossReference filter(source_system=='PARIS' && code_type_id == 198) ~> FinancialType198
TCrossReference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 827) ~> ExpenseGroup827
TCrossReference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 828) ~> ExpenseCostGroup828
FinancialType198 select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key,
		target_code,
		target_description,
		code2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FinancialType
ExpenseCostGroup828 select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key,
		target_code,
		target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExpCostGroup
ExpenseGroup827 select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key,
		target_code,
		target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExpenseGroup
FinancialType, ExpenseGroup join(FinancialType@source_code_key == ExpenseGroup@source_code_key,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExpGroup
ExpGroup, ExpCostGroup join(FinancialType@source_code_key == ExpCostGroup@source_code_key,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExspenseCostGroup
ExspenseCostGroup select(mapColumn(
		pk_exp_key = FinancialType@source_code_key,
		exp_code = FinancialType@target_code,
		exp_description = FinancialType@target_description,
		exp_cost_compensation = code2,
		exg_code = ExpenseGroup@target_code,
		exg_description = ExpenseGroup@target_description,
		ext_code = ExpCostGroup@target_code,
		ext_description = ExpCostGroup@target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
